name: E-Gift Card
description:
Give the gift of PELLE this holiday season!

Available in $25, $50, $100, $250 and $500 denominations. 

Upon purchasing, please email studio@pelledesigns.com with recipient's name and email address, as well as any message you would like to be included. Within 24 hours, unless otherwise requested, the recipient will be emailed their unique gift code. 

E-Gift Cards are redeemable for merchandise at shop.pelledesigns.com or by calling 1-718-243-1840.

No Expiration. No Cash Value. Non-refundable. Cannot be applied toward tax or shipping.

name: NEW Small Batch Soap Stones by PELLE: Sea Glass/Pine Mint
description:
This special batch of opaque Soap Stones is inspired by sea glass weathered by saltwater and the beach. The color is a frosty blue-green and its scent is a combination of fresh mint and woodsy pine. Available in a 2 oz. Nugget or 5 oz. Stone. Each soap comes individually wrapped in our new packaging.

2 oz. Nugget measures approximately 2" x 2.25" x 1"

5 oz. Stone measures approximately 4" x 2.5" x 1.25"

  
The Soap Stones are handcrafted glycerin soap intended for both use and display. Consisting of all natural, vegetable-based soap ingredients, the Soap Stones are made and hand cut in our Brooklyn studio.

Drawing from a material palette inspired by naturally occurring gemstones such as Rose Quartz and Aquamarine and metamorphic rock such as Jade and Onyx, our soaps combine these brilliant colors with the potent effects of essential oils such as Eucalyptus and Camphor. The full collection of Soap Stones range between 3 sizes and 7 color/scent combinations.

Create an exquisite display of colorful soaps on a sill, shelf or mantle – or place them by the sink for your guests as a delightful surprise!

Made in Brooklyn NY USA

description:
These hand-picked gift sets contain one 5 oz. Stone with two 2 oz. Nuggets and represent our most popular color and scent combinations. Each soap comes individually wrapped inside a cotton drawstring bag and packed together in a special gift box. Combinations include:

Jade/Eucalyptus, Aquamarine/Camphor and Rose Quartz/Grapefruit 

Aquamarine/Camphor, Crystal/Unscented and Onyx/Cassia

Rose Quartz/Grapefruit, Amber/Cedarwood and Citrine/Lemon Basil

name: ONE IN STOCK: Large Bubble Chandelier with 12k White Gold Leaf
description: Dimensions: 22" Diam. x 24" H Metal Finish: Polished Nickel Cup Finish: Polished Nickel Gilded Upgrade: All 9 globes hand-painted with 12k White Gold Leaf Decorative Coiling: Natural Leather Cord Sockets: E26 Base, 120V/240V Bulbs: 3 x G40 Clear Incandescent Globe Bulbs, 40/60W Canopy Steel cable suspension with white lamp cord and 6" canopy in polished nickel Lead Time: IN STOCK - READY TO SHIP UL/cUL Listed Bubble Chandeliers are a line of delicate and airy compositions of luminous glass globe clusters. Starting with the Original Bubble Chandelier designed in 2008, the series has developed into a collection of distinctive lights that artfully combines PELLE’s signature material palette of cotton and leather cording with blown-glass globes. Made in New York Designed in 2012

name: 12k White Gold Bubble Chandelier Upgrade
description: Brush Finish in 12k White Gold with a Bubble Chandelier purchase. Please select your light type in the pull down menu. White gold leaf is expertly hand-painted onto the surface of each glass globe. White gold leaf is similar to silver in color, however, white gold is slightly warmer in tone. Pairs wonderfully with either Polished Nickel or Satin Brass Hardware. Glass globes are individually hand-painted and variations in composition and coverage will occur throughout the light fixture. Lead Time: 1 additional week

name: 24k Gold Bubble Chandelier Upgrade
description: 24k Gold Leaf finish with a Bubble Chandelier purchase. Please select your light type in the pull down menu. Pure gold leaf is expertly hand-painted onto the surface of each glass globe. Lead Time: 1 additional week

name: Quadrat Cuboid 47 Coffee Table
description: Dimensions: 47"W x 47"D x 15"H Wood Finish Options: Solid White Oak Solid Walnut Lead Time 6-8 weeks Shipping and handling billed separately. Contact prior to purchase for detailed quote. The Quadrat Series is a line of wood lattice tables that explore the simple and elegant form of the grid as a three-dimensional object. The name “Quadrat” comes from the German word for ‘square’, the formal building block of the lattice structure. Its distinctive design is in the lightweight yet strong wood construction of its open grid geometry. The Quadrat Cube 20 acts as a side table while the larger Cuboid 20 and Cuboid 47 serve as coffee tables. The Cube and Cuboids work together with a variety of discrete tabletop objects that plug directly into the Quadrat grid. These interchangeable tabletop pieces are offered in the form of a glass puddle, a mirror-polished brass plate, an intricately carved oak tray, and hand-thrown pottery pieces. Each tabletop piece is custom-designed by PELLE and made to order by local artists and artisans. Made in New York Designed in 2011

name: Bedside Console with Leg
description: Dimensions: 14"W x 8"D x 31.5"H Wood Finish Options: Solid Maple Solid Walnut Lead Time 6-8 weeks Shipping and handling billed separately. Contact prior to purchase for detailed quote. The Entry and Bedside Consoles are compact furnishings initially created for the designers’ own narrow apartment hallway where space was limited, but the need for storage great. Despite their playful and whimsical exterior, the Entry and Bedside Consoles offer serious interior storage utility through their multi-compartmental design. The multiple drawers in the Entry Console allow for the organization of all kinds of household knick knacks such as keys, mail, tools, pens, coins, phones and chargers. Similarly, the Bedside Console has just enough room to place a drinking glass, reading material and other bedside items. Made in New York Designed in 2012

options.name: Maple, Right justified (bookshelf located on right side)

Walnut, Left justified (bookshelf located on left side)

name: DORIT Candle Holder
description:
DORIT is one of four designs that comprise the Wood Candle Holder collection which use wood of construction-grade or paint-grade lumber. The holders seek to find lasting qualities in ‘undesirable’ characteristics of the wood: cracks, discolorations, grain and knot patterns, and highlight them through simple forms and finishes. The treatment of the wood elevate the candle holder to become beautiful objects in their own right.

The DORITs come with gilded or painted facets available in 24k Gold, 12k White Gold, Mustard and Gray. DORITs are made to order and require a 2 week lead time.

Types / Dims:
Tall: 3.5"w x 2.5"d x 6.5"h
Short: 6.5"w x 3.5"d x 2.5"h

Made in New York

name: Tod Candle Holder
description:
TOD is one of four designs that comprise the Wood Candle Holder collection that use wood of construction-grade or paint-grade lumber. The holders seek to find lasting qualities in ‘undesirable’ characteristics of the wood: cracks, discolorations, grain and knot patterns, and highlight them through simple forms and finishes. The treatment of the wood elevate the candle holder to become beautiful objects in their own right.
 
The Tods come with a brushed brass insert and 24k gilded band along a segment of the wood grain.

Available in 2 sizes: 
Short: 13" H x 3.5" W 
Tall: 15" H x 3.5" W

Made in New York USA in limited quantities.

name: Billie Wood Candle Holder
description:
Turned wood candle holder with a highly polished ebonized finish. Each holder comes in a cotton drawstring bag.

Please note wood candle holders are decorative art objects and meant to be used for display only. If you decide to light candles, please take care to extinguish flame an inch above the top of holder. Never leave burning candles unattended. Candle holders are wood products and will be charred if exposed to flame.

Approximate dimensions are:
4.5” h x 3” d

name: Joyce Wood Candle Holder
description:
Cross sectioned wood with deep cracks filled with a super bright white filling. Each holder comes in a cotton drawstring bag. 

Please note wood candle holders are decorative art objects and meant to be used for display only. If you decide to light candles, please take care to extinguish flame an inch above the top of holder. Never leave burning candles unattended. Candle holders are wood products and will be charred if exposed to flame.

Available in 2 sizes:
tall: 3.5" h x 2.75" w x 2" d
short: 2.75" h x 3.5" w x 2" d

name: Double Leaf Brass Candle Holder
description:
Solid brass candle holder with double leaves and a spike for candle. Available in 3 designs.

Measures 14" tall.

Note: Melt candle end with flame before pushing into spike. Never leave a candle flame unattended.

name: Single Leaf Brass Candle Holder
description:
Solid brass candle holder with single leaf decoration and a spike for candle. Available in 3 designs.

Measures 12" tall.

Note: Melt candle end with flame before pushing into spike. Never leave a candle flame unattended.

name: Spike Brass Candle Holder
description:
Solid brass candle holder with a spike for candle. Available in 3 designs.

Measures 11" tall.

Note: Melt candle end with flame before pushing into spike. Never leave a candle flame unattended.

name: Brass Candle Holders, Set of 3
description:
A complete set of solid brass candle holders. Double Leaf, Single Leaf and Spike brass holders come in this set.

Measures 14" , 12" and 11" tall.

Note: Melt candle end with flame before pushing into spike. Never leave a candle flame unattended.

name: Soap Stones by PELLE: Aquamarine/Camphor Nugget 2oz
description:
The Nugget is our smallest size and measure approximately 2" x 2.25" x 1". Each soap comes inside a PELLE cotton drawstring bag. Color is bright cerulean blue and scent is minty fresh and penetrating.

The Soap Stones are handcrafted glycerine soap intended for both use and display. Consisting of all natural, vegetable-based soap ingredients, the Soap Stones are made and hand cut in our Brooklyn studio.

Drawing from a material palette inspired by naturally occurring gemstones such as Rose Quartz and Aquamarine and metamorphic rock such as Jade and Onyx, our soaps combine these brilliant colors with the potent effects of essential oils such as Eucalyptus and Camphor. The full collection of Soap Stones range between 3 sizes and 7 color/scent combinations.

Create an exquisite display of colorful soaps on a sill, shelf or mantle – or place them by the sink for your guests as a delightful surprise!

Made in Brooklyn NY USA

Create an exquisite display of colorful soaps on a sill, shelf or mantle – or place them by the sink for your guests as a delightful surprise!

Made in Brooklyn NY USA

name: Soap Stones by PELLE: Seconds
description:
Soap Stone Seconds are soaps didn't quite make the 1st cut: they  may be slightly underweight or the color may be just a bit off, but they are still made of the same high quality glycerin soap as our regular Soap Stones. Sometimes, they will come irregularly shaped but who doesn't love that?

Each soap second comes individually wrapped in a clear plastic bag. 

The Soap Stones are handcrafted glycerin soap intended for both use and display. Consisting of all natural, vegetable-based soap ingredients, the Soap Stones are made and hand cut in our Brooklyn studio.

name: Replacement Bulb, Small Size
description: G30 Clear Incandescent Globe bulb for Small, Medium (Original) and Pendant Bubble Chandeliers.

name: Replacement Bulb, Large Size
description: G40 Clear Incandescent Globe bulb for Large, X-Large, Pendant, Tall , X-Tall and Jumbo Bubble Chandeliers.

name: Additional Lamp Cord Length
description: Add this item to your cart to add length by the foot to your light order. Standard lamp cord length is 6' including 1' cord body portion.

name: Floor Sample: Stem Light (previous generation)
description: Dimensions: 16" H with bulb Hardware Finish: Satin Brass Cup Finish: Satin Brass Cord Color: Brown, Black Socket: E26 Base, 120V/240V Bulb: G40 Clear Incandescent Globe 120V Canopy Canopy included in matte white with 5 ft of lamp cord. Final Sale. All floor samples are non-UL/cUL listed Made in New York Designed in 2008

name: Floor Sample: X-Tall Bubble Chandelier by PELLE (previous generation)
description: Dimensions: 13" W x 61" H Hardware Finish: Satin Brass Cup Finish: Satin Brass Cording Option: Natural Cotton Cord Sockets: E26 Base, 120V/240V Bulbs: G40 Clear Incandescent Globe 120V Canopy Canopy and steel cable suspension included with 7 ft of lamp cord. Final Sale. All floor samples are non-UL/cUL listed Bubble Chandeliers are a line of delicate and airy compositions of luminous glass globe clusters. Starting with the Original Bubble Chandelier designed in 2008, the series has developed into a collection of distinctive lights that artfully combines PELLE’s signature material palette of cotton and leather cording with blown-glass globes. Made in New York Designed in 2008
